tool.name: OAuth Key Provider
tool.description: Provides an OAuth token to tools that require one.
tool.help:
`_
To obtain an OAuth token visit the link above and log in with your LDC id and password. Then paste the OAuth token into the above field and click `execute`. This will add an item to your history that can be used to supply the OAuth token to other Gigaword services that require it.
